com.bmwcarit.barefoot.util

Class PostgresSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bmwcarit.barefoot.util.PostgresSource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PostGISReader

    public class PostgresSource
extends Object
    PostgreSQL source for connecting and querying a PostgreSQL databases.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PostgresSource(String host, int port, String database, String user, String password)
      Creates a PostgresSource object.

    • Method Summary

      void close()
      Closes database connection.

      Executes a query that is specified as a query string.

      Checks if the database connection has been established.
      void open()
      Connects to the database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PostgresSource

        public PostgresSource(String host,
                      int port,
                      String database,
                      String user,
                      String password)
        Creates a PostgresSource object.
        Parameters:
        host - Host name of the database server.
        port - Port of the database server.
        database - Name of the database.
        user - User for accessing the database.
        password - Password of the user.

    • Method Detail

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Checks if the database connection has been established.
        Returns:
        True if database connection is established, false otherwise.

      • open

        public void open()
          throws SourceException
        Connects to the database.
        Throws:
        SourceException - thrown if opening database connection failed.

      • close

        public void close()
           throws SourceException
        Closes database connection.
        Throws:
        SourceException - thrown if closing database connection failed.

      • execute

        protected ResultSet execute(String query)
                     throws SourceException
        Executes a query that is specified as a query string.
        Parameters:
        query - Query string statement.
        Returns:
        Result of the query as ResultSet object.
        Throws:
        SourceException - thrown if execution of query failed.
